attributes.action: Refrain the BBC from increasing the License fee every year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to put an end to people being made to pay an increase in the Tv Licensing fee every April by £5 with no improvement in the programs the BBC Broadcasts this is Appauling as people are made to pay for other channels just to watch something decent yet they are forced to pay extortionate Tv Licensing fees or risk a fine/and or a jail sentence thus making jails overcrowed people protested over the PollTax which also wasn't fair changing it to Council Tax people have the right to freedom of choice which they clearly don't get from the BBC
